title: Dragon gold-trimmed armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dragon gold-trimmed armour is a possible reward from elite Treasure Trails. The set has identical stats to Dragon armour. The armour pieces cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

content:
A player wearing a set of gold-trimmed dragon armour.

Dragon gold-trimmed armour is a possible reward from elite Treasure Trails. The set has identical stats to Dragon armour. The armour pieces cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

The total cost of components come to approximately 130,638,664 for the completed sets shown below.

Components and bonuses[edit | edit source]

rawContent:
[[File:Dragon gold-trimmed set (lg) equipped.png|thumb|160px|A player wearing a set of gold-trimmed dragon armour.]]
'''Dragon gold-trimmed armour''' is a possible reward from [[Clue scroll (elite)|elite]] [[Treasure Trails]]. The set has identical stats to [[Dragon armour]]. The armour pieces '''cannot''' be made via the [[Smithing]] skill.

The total cost of components come to approximately {{Coins|floor{{#expr:
  ( {{GEP|Dragon full helm|1}} +
    {{GEP|Dragon full helm ornament kit|1}} +
    {{GEP|Dragon kiteshield|1}} +
    {{GEP|Dragon kiteshield ornament kit|1}} +
    {{GEP|Dragon platebody|1}} +
    {{GEP|Dragon platebody ornament kit|1}} +
    ({{GEP|Dragon plateskirt|1}} + {{GEP|Dragon plateskirt|1}})/2 +
    {{GEP|Dragon legs/skirt ornament kit|1}} )
}}}} for the completed sets shown below.

==Components and bonuses==
{{Infotable Bonuses|Dragon full helm (g)|Dragon platebody (g)|Dragon platelegs (g)|Dragon kiteshield (g)}}
{{Infotable Bonuses|Dragon full helm (g)|Dragon platebody (g)|Dragon plateskirt (g)|Dragon kiteshield (g)}}
